examples.text: My parents didn't know we had a snow day so they both woke me up for school
Thank god for another snow day . Now I can get more sleep
Shaker needs to give that snow day or I'm gonna cry?❄️
buried in snow that should be an adult snow day right ?
Can we get a snow day PLEASE ?
did Mike get a snow day too ? !
premeditated thoughts of a decent excuse for a snow day . And we get a half an inch
OF BIRTHDAYS SYDRA . I GOT YOU A SNOW DAY FOR YOUR BIRTHDAY SO YOU'RE WELCOME ??

relations.target: day: time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; 'two days later they left'; 'they put on two performances every day'; 'there are 30,000 passengers per day' <i116858>
snow: precipitation falling from clouds in the form of ice crystals <i98073>
day: time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; 'two days later they left'; 'they put on two performances every day'; 'there are 30,000 passengers per day' <i116858>

senses.definition: a day on which school or other events are cancelled due to snow
